title: Investigator-by-treatment interaction for ADAS-Cog(11) ANCOVA

coding.display: Defined in handling and category elements

description: The Investigator-by-treatment interaction variable is polychotomous (a category for each investigator) but the investigator names are unknown at the time of trial planning so the category element is not used to define the categories.
name: Investigator_by_treatment_interaction_for_ADAS_Cog11_ANCOVA
